meanings.definition: A type of edible mushroom with a large cap and meaty texture.
meanings.sent1: I cooked some delicious portabellas for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on portabellas, so I bought a bunch.
meanings.sent3: The portabellas danced in the pan as they sizzled in the butter.
meanings.sent4: The portabellas stood tall like little umbrellas in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sautéed portabellas filled the kitchen with a savory scent.
